bioghist.p: Andrew M. Ramsay was born in Glasgow in 1859. He was educated at school in Linlithgow, and studied at the University of Glasgow. Latterly he was an ophthalmic surgeon at Glasgow Royal Infirmary, and had been Professor of Opthalmology at St. Mungo's College, Glasgow. He died in 1946.

scopecontent.p: The material is composed of a prescription for Miss Graham, and a portion of a humorous letter.
